layman_description: Emergency equipment that instantly transports you back to your base.
technical_description: Equipment with teleport functionality and respawn point linking.
player_impact: Escape dangerous situations instantly without dying.

layman_description: Ancient artifact piece that opens temporary rifts to other locations.
technical_description: Equipment with portal creation and fast-travel capability.
player_impact: Create fast travel gateways between discovered locations.

layman_description: Mystical object that marks locations you can teleport back to.
technical_description: Item with waypoint creation and anchor point management.
player_impact: Warp to any previously marked location instantly.

layman_description: Technology that reduces space inside containers exponentially.
technical_description: Equipment with inventory expansion and weight reduction multiplier.
player_impact: Containers hold many more items without getting heavier.

layman_description: Device that prevents environmental hazards from affecting you.
technical_description: Equipment with environmental protection and hazard immunity.
player_impact: Environment cannot harm you through damage or effects.

layman_description: Tech that links your status between yourself and an anchor point.
technical_description: Equipment with status mirroring and health synchronization.
player_impact: Mirror your healing to distant locations or other players.

layman_description: Mystical artifact that increases luck in all random outcomes.
technical_description: Equipment with RNG bias and outcome favorability boost.
player_impact: Looting and random events favor you heavily.

layman_description: Magical jewelry that increases value of all items you find.
technical_description: Equipment with economic value scaling and trader price bonus.
player_impact: Everything you find sells for significantly more money.

layman_description: Enchanted object that makes your crafted items superior quality.
technical_description: Equipment with crafting quality bonus and special effect chance.
player_impact: All items you craft are higher tier with bonuses.

layman_description: Ancient charm that enhances combat ability and weapon effectiveness.
technical_description: Equipment with combat bonus and melee damage multiplication.
player_impact: Deal much more damage with all weapons.

layman_description: Spiritual object that grants healing auras around your character.
technical_description: Equipment with healing radius and regeneration area effect.
player_impact: Nearby allies automatically heal from your presence.

layman_description: Crystal that reveals hidden enemies and loot through walls.
technical_description: Equipment with detection boost and visibility penetration.
player_impact: See through walls and detect enemies and items everywhere.

layman_description: Magical barrier that shields you from damage automatically.
technical_description: Equipment with passive damage absorption and ward strength.
player_impact: Automatically blocks incoming damage up to limit.

layman_description: Cursed artifact that teleports you away when attacked.
technical_description: Equipment with evasion trigger and displacement ability.
player_impact: Automatically escape when taking massive damage.

layman_description: Substance that sends you into powerful fighting frenzy mode.
technical_description: Consumable with damage boost and attack speed multiplier.
player_impact: Enter uncontrollable frenzy dealing double damage.

layman_description: Ancient book that grants knowledge of secret crafting recipes.
technical_description: Equipment with recipe unlock and crafting knowledge bonus.
player_impact: Learn secret recipes normally unavailable to craft.

layman_description: Forbidden book that teaches dangerous but powerful techniques.
technical_description: Equipment with special ability unlock and power cost.
player_impact: Use forbidden abilities with dangerous but powerful effects.

layman_description: Reflective artifact that reverses negative effects onto attackers.
technical_description: Equipment with effect reflection and damage redirection.
player_impact: Damage and effects you receive bounce back onto enemies.

layman_description: Shard that causes decay in zombie undead weakening them.
technical_description: Equipment with degradation aura and undead weakness.
player_impact: Nearby zombies degrade and weaken without attacking.

layman_description: Glowing sphere that generates free resources slowly over time.
technical_description: Equipment with resource generation and production per second.
player_impact: Gain free random resources continuously.
